Local Enchant Province - Gem Duration:Iron Walls
Dispelled if province changes owners :1
Hidden Enchantment :1
Only castable in forted province:1
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster transforms the stone walls of a castle into iron walls, making it almost impregnable. The alteration lasts longer if additional gems are used in the ritual. The enchantment will end if the caster is killed.
Fort defence increase: 1000 points.
